Instruction: Cook the couscous according to package instructions, using water as the cooking liquid.
In a large bowl, combine cooked couscous, blackberries, sliced green onions, sliced almonds, and chopped parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the couscous mixture and toss gently to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
